scripts.watch: watchify -vd -t babelify -p [ browserify-hmr -u http://`ipconfig getifaddr en0`:8888 -h `ipconfig getifaddr en0` -p 8888 ] index.js -o bundle.js
scripts.build-closure: browserify index.js | java -jar compiler.jar --language_out=ES5 > bundle.js; html-inline -i index.html -o dist/index.html
scripts.build: browserify -t babelify index.js > bundle.js; html-inline -i index.html -o dist/index.html
